content: The Back Scratcher is one of the Curios items you can easily miss in Black Myth: Wukong, especially as it is actually located in a chapter you have already completed by the time you have access to it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Back_Scratcher.md', within the main section titled 'Back Scratcher'.
The content is as follows:
The Back Scratcher is one of the Curios items you can easily miss in Black Myth: Wukong, especially as it is actually located in a chapter you have already completed by the time you have access to it.
